R

Race - Class in GeneralRepository
This file describes the Race itself.
Race(int, LinkedList<Integer>) - Constructor for class GeneralRepository.Race
Race Constructor - this constructor inits the horses positions and select the horses that will participate in the race.
Races - Class in GeneralRepository
 
races - Variable in class GeneralRepository.Races
Race array.
RacingTrack - Class in shared
This file contains the shared memory region Racing Track.
RacingTrack() - Constructor for class shared.RacingTrack
 
relaxABit() - Method in class shared.ControlCentre
Method to get the spectator to relax a bit - death state.
relaxABit() - Method in interface shared.IControlCentre
 
reportResults() - Method in class shared.ControlCentre
Method to report the bet results to the spectators.
reportResults() - Method in interface shared.IControlCentre
 
run() - Method in class entities.Broker
The run method of the Broker executes its entire life cycle, making the transitions between the states: Opening the event - Announcin next race - Waiting for bets - Supervising the race - Settling accounts - Playing host at the bar.
run() - Method in class entities.HorseJockey
The run method of the HorseJockey executes its entire life cycle, making the transitions between the states: At the stable - At the paddock - At the start line - Running - At the finish line.
run() - Method in class entities.Spectators
The run method of the Spectator executes its entire life cycle, making the transitions between the states: Waiting for a race to start - Appraising the horses - Placing a bet - Watching a race - Collecting the gains - Celebrating.
